title: Same price, fewer features - Nothing Ear (Stick)
description: UGREEN Black Friday Homepage    UGREEN 65W USB C Charging Station   UGREEN 7-in-1 USB C Hub 4K@60Hz   25% off code for 6-in-1 Hub  255IA6TD UGREEN Adjustable Phone Stand    UGREEN 2-in-1 USB C SD Card Reader   Note: All product are valid from November 24th to November 28th  Nothing has been focused on style-first products that have been impressing us with their value proposition, but can Nothing continue to keep prices low? James is here to take a look at the new Nothing Ear (stick) earbuds that replace the Nothing Ear (1) as their entry-level earbuds.   Buy a Nothing Ear (Stick):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Something's different here 0:35 Unboxing 1:46 Case impressions 3:37 A closer look at the beanular buds 5:22 Sponsor - UGREEN 5:51 Using the Nothing app 9:39 Music and touch control impressions 11:02 Battery life and specs 11:36 Wait, no ANC?! 12:07 Overall thoughts 13:02 Outro
